msg: - Fixed #9090: Element times are not available in the output.

msg: - Added an optional parameter to listMessages() method in IMAP, to return
messages with a certain Content-Type header (eg. "multipart/mixed" to
return the list of messages with attachments).

msg: - Mark the IMAP transport as a main class.
